name: Car Game 85
description:
Car 85
Jump over obstacles to reach checkpoint! And increase your knowledge in Turkish :)

An action script conversion of the car game I made on zx spectrum basic in 1985.

Game logic done very quickly and backgrounds added on party place while chatting.

Keys:
Cursors L/R - speed
Space - Jump

Warning: the car will not jump if you jump repeatedly. Time your jumps carefully.

Note.

Not intended for serious crowds. Party version, total time spent: <not enough>. (Do not expect a full version).

Ref, 2013 7Dx - Istanbul
